movie.title: Falcon Rising
movie.description_intro: FAVELA, the first installment in the CODENAME: FALCON franchise, introduces former marine John "Falcon" Chapman, a dark anti-hero driven by guilt and suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder, who will destroy himself unless given something else to destroy - a useful weapon-of-last-resort for the U.S. State Department. When Chapman's sister is brutally attacked while on assignment in Brazil, Chapman flies into Sao Paulo to track down her assailants, quickly entering the city's seedy underbelly and discovering a world of drugs, the sex trade, corrupt cops, and organized crime syndicates battling for control.
movie.description_full: FAVELA, the first installment in the CODENAME: FALCON franchise, introduces former marine John "Falcon" Chapman, a dark anti-hero driven by guilt and suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder, who will destroy himself unless given something else to destroy - a useful weapon-of-last-resort for the U.S. State Department. When Chapman's sister is brutally attacked while on assignment in Brazil, Chapman flies into Sao Paulo to track down her assailants, quickly entering the city's seedy underbelly and discovering a world of drugs, the sex trade, corrupt cops, and organized crime syndicates battling for control.

movies.title: Half White
movies.summary: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.
movies.description_full: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.
movies.synopsis: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.

movies.title: Rampant
movies.summary: Lee Chung is a Prince of Joseon, but he has been taken hostage to the Qing Dynasty. He enjoys boozing, womanizing and gambling. He is also an excellent swordsman. His older brother Lee Young will succeed to the throne and brings Lee Chung to Joseon. He returns after more than 10 years. Soon, Lee Chung faces monsters that run rampant in the night.

movies.title: Nineteen Summers
movies.summary: Born in the generational Los Angeles street culture a 19-year-old father seeks a better life in the midst of a turf war.
movies.description_full: Born in the generational Los Angeles street culture a 19-year-old father seeks a better life in the midst of a turf war.
movies.synopsis: Born in the generational Los Angeles street culture a 19-year-old father seeks a better life in the midst of a turf war.

movies.title: Overheard 3
movies.summary: In the 1970s, the Hong Kong government enacted a policy that granted each male heir of New Territories villagers the privilege to build a house without paying any dues to the government. Since then, those grants have become a commodity that village leaders can profit from.
